name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Dynamic and results-driven Senior Sales Engineer with over 13 years of experience in delivering high-performance solutions, focusing on **Cloud Security**, **Cybersecurity**, and **Enterprise Network** configurations. Leveraging expertise in compliance standards and frameworks, including **CISSP** and **CCNP**, to align business objectives with technological capabilities in sectors like healthcare and finance.
Proficient in articulating the technical value of security solutions, utilizing **Value Selling Methodologies** effectively to build relationships and foster client trust. Demonstrated capability in deploying **cloud-native systems** on platforms like **AWS** and **Azure**, ensuring alignment with industry standards and enhancing organizational security posture.
Adept at integrating automation tools and developing secure architectures involving **DLP**, **IPS**, **CASB**, and **SASE**. Strong analytical skills complemented by a proven track record in the MLOps domain, utilizing tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** for optimizing AI/ML-powered solutions.

Engaged in continuous education on evolving cybersecurity trends and technologies, ensuring the deployment of innovative solutions tailored to the market demands.

Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop tailored security solutions that align with specific client needs, realizing **25%** faster deployment times and ensuring robust protection across their environments.
